job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>CALA makes it easy to design, produce, and deliver your own fully-custom fashion products — and we're hiring a full-stack engineer to join our team. We have some incredible customers but we’re still a small crew; you'll help define our engineering team culture, technology choices, and roadmap, and be a key part of the next phase of our growth.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Contribute across the whole stack; web, iOS, backend services and more. Our tech stack is mostly TypeScript, node.js, React / React Native, and PostgreSQL, but we try to use the best tools to solve each problem.</li><li>Work closely with your team to solve problems, plan solutions, and bring them to life; anything from 3D rendering to analytics engines. You'll have deep product ownership and be an important stakeholder as we plan new features.</li><li>Help us build the processes and tools we need to take things to the next level.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements</strong></p><ul><li>4+ years professional software development experience.</li><li>Strong knowledge of JavaScript and web technology.</li><li>Experience writing unit &amp; integration tests.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Nice to have</strong></p><ul><li>Experience building performant native iOS apps</li><li>Experience with TypeScript, Flow, or a strongly-typed language.</li><li>Experience with React or another component-driven framework.</li><li>Experience building distributed, scalable systems.</li><li>We’re a distributed team, but we do have an office in NYC that you’re able to work from if you’re in the area.</li></ul>
